title: Simply Somm
description: An app to help wine and whiskey enthusiasts find a perfect bottle based on taste and aroma preferences

title: OnHand
description: A site that pulls recipes for meals and cocktails based on ingredients you have on hand.

title: Eat Da Burger
description: An MYSQL based application to keep track of burgers you want to eat.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A progressive web application to keep track of your withdrawals and deposits using mongoDB and indexedDB.

title: Note Taker
description: A note taking app using an express backend to save and retrieve note data from a database.

title: Day Planner
description: A day planner using moments.js and local storage to keep track of a 9 to 5 workday.
